original: @291b rgya gar skar du /
analyzed: @291b rgya gar skar du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: kro dha bhur kum k'u ta r'a dza sto tra mantra /
analyzed: kro dha bhur kum k'u ta r'a dza sto tra mantra /
translated: Krodharājakūṭarājasastotramantrā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags /
translated: The mantra of praise to the wrathful king Kūṭarājas

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: aom bhur kum ma h'a pr'a n'a ya /
analyzed: aom bhur kum ma h'a pr'a n'a ya /
translated: Oṃ bhūkaṃ mahāpārṇāya

original: bhur tsi bhur ki ma n'a se /
analyzed: bhur tsi bhur ki ma n'a se /
translated: bhūci bhūci manase

original: au tsu sma kro dha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: au tsu sma kro dha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: ucchuṣma krodha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage, homage, homage, praise!

original: khro la khros pas khro bo che //
analyzed: khro la khros pas khro bo che //
translated: Wrathful, wrathful, very wrathful,

original: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas //
translated: Buddha, Buddha, former Buddha,

original: chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku //
translated: Dharma body, enjoyment body, emanation body,

original: sme brtsegs zhes bya bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sme brtsegs zhes bya bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the one called Kūṭarāja.

original: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na //
analyzed: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na //
translated: In the midst of a blazing fire like the eon fire,

original: pad ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: pad ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a lotus, sun, and moon seat,

original: ljang nag chen po sme ba can //
analyzed: ljang nag chen po sme ba can //
translated: Great dark green one with moles,

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste //
translated: With three faces and six arms,

original: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus ljang ba //
analyzed: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus ljang ba //
translated: Right white, left red, center green,

original: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mche ba 'byin //
analyzed: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mche ba 'byin //
translated: With three eyes, baring terrifying fangs.

original: mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol //🔽g-yas pa rdo rje ral gri bsnams //
analyzed: mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol // g-yas pa rdo rje ral gri bsnams //
translated: You consume filth as if it were the elixir of immortality.🔽In your right hand you hold a vajra and a sword,

original: g-yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o //
translated: In your left a noose and a hook.

original: tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol //
analyzed: tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol //
translated: With your little finger you make the threatening mudrā at your heart.

original: sme gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson //
analyzed: sme gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson //
translated: You are diligent in the practice of purity and impurity.

original: gdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus brgyan //
analyzed: gdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus brgyan //
translated: Your head and body are adorned with poisonous snakes.

original: 'jigs dngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod //
analyzed: 'jigs dngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod //
translated: You engage in the conduct of fearlessness.

original: khro rgyal khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khro rgyal khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, King of Wrathful Ones.

original: mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad //
translated: You make the impure pure.

original: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, King of Wrathful Ones.

original: 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad //
translated: You protect from all fears.

original: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, King of Wrathful Ones.

original: nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad //
analyzed: nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad //
translated: You guard from illness and contagion.

original: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, King of Wrathful Ones.🔽You are the supreme remover of all

original: mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang @292a *//🔽gos; ;thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog /🔽lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon //
analyzed: mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang @292a *// gos; ;thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon //
translated: Filthy food and filthy clothes.🔽You delight all the gods, nāgas, and yakṣa demons

original: thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad //
translated: Without exception.

original: nad dang rims dang dal ka yams //
analyzed: nad dang rims dang dal ka yams //
translated: Diseases, epidemics, and calamities,

original: bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I praise and offer homage to the one who performs the activity of protection.

original: bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol //🔽mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad //
analyzed: bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol // mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad //
translated: Please perform the protection for me.🔽You make the impure pure,

original: sme ba rnams ni mi smer mdzad //🔽lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad //
analyzed: sme ba rnams ni mi smer mdzad // lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad //
translated: You make the ugly beautiful,🔽You make the heavy light,

original: dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod //
analyzed: dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod //
translated: I praise the one who makes the narrow vast.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyed //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyed //
translated: You, Krodharaja Kila,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Are blessed by all the buddhas.

original: gang dag khyed la mos rten rnams //
analyzed: gang dag khyed la mos rten rnams //
translated: Those who have faith and rely on you

original: lus bde sems bde dbang po bde //
analyzed: lus bde sems bde dbang po bde //
translated: Have a blissful body, blissful mind, and blissful senses.

original: bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the blissful deity.

original: lus dag sems dag dbang po dag /
analyzed: lus dag sems dag dbang po dag /
translated: With a pure body, pure mind, and pure senses,

original: dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the pure deity.

original: lus gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang //
analyzed: lus gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang //
translated: With a clean body, clean mind, and clean senses,

original: gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the clean deity.🔽With a clear body, clear mind, and clear senses,

original: lus dang sems dang dbang po dang // dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lus dang sems dang dbang po dang // dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the clear deity.

original: lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal //
analyzed: lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal //
translated: With a bright body, bright mind, and bright senses,

original: gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽lha klu yi dvags 'dre srin sogs //
analyzed: gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo // lha klu yi dvags 'dre srin sogs //
translated: Homage to the clear deity.🔽Having heard this,🔽the gods, nāgas, pretas, rākṣasas,

original: gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na //
analyzed: gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na //
translated: yakṣas, and bhūtas

original: sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur //
translated: will have their suffering pacified and become happy.

original: gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar par 'gyur //🔽shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar par 'gyur // shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur //
translated: They will become as white as a snow mountain,🔽as pure as a crystal,

original: me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: as clear as a mirror,

original: nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar 'gyur //🔽sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yi //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar 'gyur // sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yi //
translated: and as radiant as the sky.🔽All the eight classes of gods, nāgas, and so forth

original: lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun //
analyzed: lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun //
translated: who dwell in the earth and sky

original: dge ba'i bsams pas 'khod 'gyur te //
analyzed: dge ba'i bsams pas 'khod 'gyur te //
translated: will gather with virtuous thoughts

original: gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzod //
analyzed: gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzod //
translated: and make peace, not harming others.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod @292b pa'i sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod @292b pa'i sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The praise of the wrathful king, Me-tse, along with the mantra, is complete.
